power.title: Drop and Roll
power.fluff: You fall off a ledge, but your training allows you to dash forward after landing safely

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You fall and take no damage from the fall

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 3 squares.

power.title: Familiar Footing
power.fluff: You are comfortable maneuvering around precarious terrain

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you ignore difficult terrain.

power.title: Rapid Escape
power.fluff: You suddenly slip from your enemy's grasp, leaving it breafly vulnerable to your attacks

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be grabbed.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an Acrobatics check to escape.
If the check succeeds and a creature was grabbing you, the creature grants combat advantage to you until the end of your current turn.

power.title: Incredible Stride
power.fluff: You move with amazing swiftness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Incredible Stride stance.
Until the stance ends, you gain a +4 power bonus to speed.

power.title: Rapid Escape
power.fluff: You suddenly push away from your enemy's grasp, leaving it breafly vulnerable to your attacks

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be grabbed.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make an Athletics check to escape.
If the check succeeds and a creature was grabbing you, the creature grants combat advantage to you until the end of your current turn.

power.title: Strength Against Strength
power.fluff: You dramatically flourish your weapon after a failure to hit your foe, hoping the sweep it off its feet

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You miss an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Check:
section.target: the triggering enemy
section.text: Athletics vs. Fortitude

section.name: Success:
section.text: Choose one of the following two effects:
You knock the target prone.
You slide the target 1 square.

power.title: Improvisational Ritualist
power.fluff: As you perform a ritual, you intersperse made up words and improvise components, using odds and ends at hand

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You use this power as part of casting a ritual of one-half your level or lower

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of the following two benefits:
You need to expend only half of the ritual's gold piece component cost, though any focus item must still meet the minimum cost.
You can use your Bluff check modifier in place of any other skill check modifier the ritual.

power.title: Stall Tactics
power.fluff: Your fast-talking causes your enemies to hesitate for a crucial moment

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Initiative is rolled

section.name: Target:
section.target: each enemy that can see and hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target's initiative is reduced by 10.

power.title: Befriend
power.fluff: You know the right things to say to make people like you

section.name: Target:
section.target: one nonhostile creature in range that has Intelligence 5 or higher

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +4 power bonus to Diplomacy checks against the target, and a +2 power bonus to Bluff checks against the target.

power.title: Cry for Mercy
power.fluff: With pleading words and gestures, you discourage your enemies from striking down the wounded

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, or one ally in range; the target must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn or until the target is no longer bloodied, the target's movement does not provoke reactive strikes, and the target gains a +4 power bonus to all defenses.
If the target makes an attack before the effect ends, his or her movement again provokes and the power bonus to defenses becomes +2 instead.

power.title: Noble Sacrifice
power.fluff: You demand an enemy face you to distract it from your wounded friend, who is inspired by your sacrifice

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy makes a melee attack against a bloodied ally adjacent to you

section.name: Target:
section.target: The triggering enemy in range

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target the triggering attack against you instead of the ally. This happens even if you would normally be outside of the attack's reach.
If the attack hits you, the ally gains temporary hit points equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier. On a miss, the ally gains half as many temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 5 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 9 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

power.title: Immersed in Darkness
power.fluff: You know how to stay concealed, even from creatures that can see in the dark

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be in dim light or darkness.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You become invisible until the start of your next turn, until you attack, or until you enter bright light, whichever comes first.

power.title: Insane Logic
power.fluff: You abandon conventions of the world's natural laws to break through an aberrant creature's defenses

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one aberrant creature that you can see within 5 squares of you.

You make a Dungeoneering check to determine that creature's resistances and vulnerabilities. On success, in addition to the normal result, your attacks ignore the creature's resistances until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Spider Dodge
power.fluff: With your back against a wall, you trick your enemy into misjudging and striking the wall as you duck out of the way

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with a melee attack when you are adjacent to blocking terrain

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack equal to 1 + one-half your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: The Lightest of Tremors
power.fluff: You can navigate in complete darkness by feeling the tremors in the ground

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain tremorsense 5 until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The tremorsense persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Trap Sense
power.fluff: As the trap springs, your experience in dealing with such hazards lets you step aside and leave a foe at the trap's mercy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A trap or hazard makes an attack against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.
If the attack was a melee or a ranged attack and it misses you, the trap rerolls the attack against an enemy adjacent to you.

power.title: Prepare for the Pain
power.fluff: Your body recalls all the pain and suffering it has already endured, preparing take on even more

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to gain the following benefits until the end of the encounter:
You cannot be weakened.
You gain resist 10 to all damage.

power.title: Reactive Resurgence
power.fluff: The attack was well placed, but you choose not to let it affect you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You become bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

power.title: Steeled Against It
power.fluff: Once stung by your enemy's attack, you harden your body and mind against such future pain

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take damage that has one or more damage types

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist against the triggering damage type or types until the end of the encounter. The resist equals one-half your level.
If you already have resistance to that damage type or types, that resistance instead increases by 5 until the end if the encounter.

power.title: Plague Doctor
power.fluff: You have gathered extensive knowledge regarding all manner of disease and how to treat them

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You use this power as part of the Treat Disease use of the Heal skill

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature infected by a disease

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: One or two creatures

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Up to five creatures

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You roll twice when you make your Heal check, and use either result.
You also count as automatically succeeding on aid another for the Endurance check (or other check) the target makes against the disease.

power.title: Spot Weakness
power.fluff: You pinpoint a weakness and direct your next attack toward it

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to the first damage roll you make against the target before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Time Out
power.fluff: You grant your comrade a moment of respite

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains the use of his or her second wind.
If the target has not expended his or her second wind, he or she instead regains additional hit points equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier if he or she uses it before the end of his or her next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 2d6 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 3d8 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Lessons in History
power.fluff: As you watch your allies, you focus and draw upon past lessons to offer a few pointers to each

section.name: Target:
section.target: each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge to allow each target to regain one expended encounter utility power of level 10 or lower.

power.title: Tactician's Measure
power.fluff: The enemies' movements are similar to those used in a skirmish you once studied, so you know how to outmaneuver one of them

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy enters a square adjacent to either you or to an ally adjacent to you

section.name: Target:
section.target: you or the ally, whichever the triggering enemy moved adjacent to

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target shifts 1 square, and gains a +2 bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy until the end of the triggering enemy's next turn.

power.title: Insightful Comment
power.fluff: You assess the situation and offer words of advice that guide the conversation in a fruitful direction

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each target gains a power bonus to Bluff checks, Diplomacy checks, and Intimidate checks. The bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Prescient Defense
power.fluff: You anticipate your foe's attack and ably defend yourself

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are hit by a creature; you must be aware of the creature, though you don't necessarily need to see it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.

power.title: Snap Out of It!
power.fluff: A smack across the face brings your ally back to his or her senses

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally; the target must be subject to a dazing, dominating or stunning effect that a save can end, or any Charm or Fear effect

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a saving throw against one qualifying effect.

power.section: If the effect normally ends on a save, the target gains a power bonus to the saving throw equal to one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

power.title: Stall Tactics
power.fluff: Your fearsome words cause your enemies to hesitate for a crucial moment

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Initiative is rolled

section.name: Target:
section.target: each enemy that can see and hear you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target's initiative is reduced by 10.

power.title: Healing Herbs
power.fluff: You aid a wounded companion by applying a poultice of healing herbs

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally; the target cannot perform actions as part of the rest

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a Nature check. The target regains hit points equal to one-half the result of your check.

power.title: Spot the Path
power.fluff: Having walked miles of broken trails, you know how to find the safest way through the most treacherous terrain

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target ignores difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Focused Sight
power.fluff: The noise of battle grows faint, and the flash of blade and spell fades away as you focus all your senses on your target

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you do not take penalties to attack rolls against the target because of any cover, superior cover, concealment or total concealment the target might have.

power.title: Perfect Sight
power.fluff: Enemies might hide, but once your find a trace of them, there's no escaping you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain your choice of either blindsight 5 or blindsense 10.

power.title: Spot Weakness
power.fluff: You pinpoint a weakness and direct your next attack toward it

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to the first damage roll you make against the target before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Uncanny Instincts
power.fluff: Your keen senses guide your and your friend's reactions

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would roll initiative

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and one ally in the burst who can hear or see you; neither target can have rolled initiative yet

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target uses your passive Perception in place of making an initiative check. You choose which of you acts first.

power.title: Assurance of Prophecy
power.fluff: You call out verses of prophecy, and the knowledge is on your side renews your ally's vigor

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within range spends a healing surge

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains 3d6 temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3d8 temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4d10 temporary hit points.

power.title: Conviction
power.fluff: You whisper a prayer for aid to overcome hardship

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can roll twice when making the first saving throw before the start of your next turn.
If the effect has has the Charm or Fear keyword, you also gain a +2 bonus to the saving throw.

power.title: Recitation
power.fluff: You echo your allies' prayers to give them strength

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Your allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls while in the aura.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The aura persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Crowd Cover
power.fluff: You keep enemies between you and their companion, using them as a shield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy makes a ranged attack roll against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Enemies adjacent to you and in the attack's way grant cover to you against the triggering attack.
If the triggering attack misses, the attacker rerolls it against one enemy of its choice that granted cover to you against it.

power.title: Immersed in Darkness
power.fluff: You know how to stay concealed, even from creatures that can see in the dark

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be in dim light or darkness.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You become invisible until the start of your next turn, until you attack, or until you enter bright light, whichever comes first.

power.title: Persistent Tail
power.fluff: You follow your prey unseen, waiting for the best time to strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one creature you can see and that you have cover or concealment against.

The first time the target moves before the start of your next turn, you can move your speed as an opportunity reaction. If you end the move with cover or concealment against the target, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden and don't take -5 penalty for moving more than 2 squares.

power.title: Crowd Cover
power.fluff: You keep enemies between you and their companion, using them as a shield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy makes a ranged attack roll against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Enemies adjacent to you and in the attack's way grant cover to you against the triggering attack.
If the triggering attack misses, the attacker rerolls it against one enemy of its choice that granted cover to you against it.

power.title: Navigate Crowds
power.fluff: A life spent in the city trained you to maneuver through crowds

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your speed. During this movement, you can move through enemies' spaces.

power.title: Disruptive Stunt
power.fluff: With a flurry of taps, shoves, and nudges, you push past your foe, leaving it flustered

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed through the target's space to a square adjacent to it. This movement does not provoke reactive strikes from the target.
In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Trap Sense
power.fluff: As the trap springs, your experience in dealing with such hazards lets you step aside and leave a foe at the trap's mercy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A trap or hazard makes an attack against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.
If the attack was a melee or a ranged attack and it misses you, the trap rerolls the attack against an enemy adjacent to you.
